about_the_game:
Elaine, a novice adventurer, arrived at the adventurer's gathering town of "Lutnak."
Her dream is to become an S-rank adventurer, the highest rank achievable.
However, the city is full of dangers, with crime-ridden slums nearby, and monsters in dungeons that pose a threat to women.




Elaine
CV：神代 そら

Minette
CV：御子柴 泉
Chris
CV：餅梨 あむ
Lynn
CV：葉月 ゆう
Naya
CV：天野 すあま

Scene Voices Included

H-scenes with voices. The lewdness is presented with their voices!

Animation

Animations for erotic events during battles! Smooth, fluid animations enhance the sensuality.

Erotic Combat

Some monsters will attack during battles! Clothing may be torn, restraint may occur, and if unable to escape, violation follows!
(Erotic combat events are limited to Elaine.)

Erotic Status

The fundamental erotic RPG element, the Erotic Status system, is fully integrated!
First experiences, current partner and situation, and the numerical value of erotic exp are recorded.

Karma Value

Engaging in wrongful acts increases the "Karma Value."
When this value rises, consequences such as arrest or encountering lascivious situations may occur...?

Lewdness Level

When Elaine experiences erotic situations, her lewdness level increases.
The reaction of Elaine in erotic scenes changes based on this value!

No Game Over

Even if defeated in battle, the game does not end in a game over, allowing you to continue the game with peace of mind.

150,000 words of rich content

Completely explain the story of the heroine and other characters.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains  non-consensual sex,  sexual acts, sexual assault, genital nudity scenes, Interspecies Sex, BDSM, etc. It is not suitable for all ages. All characters in this work are over 20 years old.

name: Lutnak・Quest Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0b
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: A pure noob adventurer, in order to become an S-rank adventurer, she gradually crossed her bottom line again and again and became...
